content: Any ideas what we want to do? I don't think we have access
we can punt on this for now, we can come up with a decision when we are close to a stable release
Yup, just wanted to put the idea out there and see if anyone comes up with something in the meanwhile
I could write a number of posts about cap's internal machinery, the algorithms, the compromises had to be made and so on. Pretty much the same stuff Kevin had been writing.
We could also host guides and recipes.
i suspect there will be a good number of them. We will probably want a separate book-style guide for it. We've even got a repo to resurrect! https://github.com/clap-rs/clap-book
